title: Install issues
creator: re777
content: I kept getting msgs from xfinity server " we have temporarily blacklisted your IP address, try again later." So I uninstalled Thunderbird from my Android and reinstall it and imported the settings from my desktop Thunderbird, using the QR Code method. My Android Thunderbird now only shows the output folder. It has not tried to fetch an email. Or show any inbox trash or sent folders. What's going on?
